abstract: Sec of State John Kerry's active approach to Syria's civil war, and to Russia's involvement in it, contrasts markedly with Pres Obama's detached and pessimistic view of the conflict; men's differing outlooks define opposite ends of American approach to crisis that many, including Obama, see as intractable.
lead_paragraph: The idea that solving the crisis in Syria, or any diplomatic dilemma, may be elusive, perhaps even impossible, is no deterrent to Secretary of State John Kerry.

headline.main: John Kerry Rushes In Where Obama Will Not Tread
headline.print_headline: Kerry Rushes In Where Obama Will Not Tread

snippet: The idea that solving the crisis in Syria, or any diplomatic dilemma, may be elusive, perhaps even impossible, is no deterrent to Secretary of State John Kerry.
